magic-missile.desc: This is a Signature spell. Signature spells are free to cast.Launch a missile of magic energy, causing 125% weapon damage as Arcane.

charged-blast.desc: Increases the damage of Magic Missile to 163% weapon damage as Arcane.

split.desc: Fire 3 missiles that each deal 56% weapon damage as Arcane.

penetrating-blast.desc: Missiles have a 100% chance to pierce through their target and hit additional enemies.

attunement.desc: Whenever Magic Missile hits a target you gain 4 Arcane Power.

seeker.desc: Missiles track the nearest enemy and their damage is increased to 138% weapon damage as Arcane.

ray-of-frost.desc: Cost: 16 Arcane PowerProject a beam of frozen ice that blasts 215% weapon damage as Cold to the first enemy it hits, slowing the target's movement by 60% for 4 seconds.

numb.desc: Increase the amount the target's movement is slowed to 80% for 4 seconds.

snow-blast.desc: Using continuously on a single target increases damage over 1.5 seconds to inflict a maximum of 280% weapon damage as Cold.

cold-blood.desc: Reduce casting cost to 0 Arcane Power.

sleet-storm.desc: Create a swirling storm around you, dealing 280% weapon damage as Cold to all enemies caught within it.

black-ice.desc: Enemies killed with Ray of Frost leave behind a patch of ice that deals 387% weapon damage as Cold to enemies moving through it over 3 seconds.

shock-pulse.desc: This is a Signature spell. Signature spells are free to cast.Release a medium range pulse of 3 unpredictable charges of electricity that deal 105% weapon damage as Lightning.

explosive-bolts.desc: Slain enemies explode, dealing 70% weapon damage as Lightning to every enemy within 10 yards.

fire-bolts.desc: Cast bolts of fire that each deal 152% weapon damage as Fire.

piercing-orb.desc: Merge the bolts in a single giant orb that oscillates forward dealing 105% weapon damage as Lightning to everything it hits.

lightning-affinity.desc: Every target hit by a pulse restores 3 Arcane Power.

living-lightning.desc: Conjure a being of lightning that drifts forward, electrocuting nearby enemies for 37% weapon damage as Lightning.

frost-nova.desc: Cooldown: 12 secondsBlast nearby enemies with an explosion of ice and freeze them for 3 seconds.

shatter.desc: A frozen enemy that is killed has a 50% chance of releasing another Frost Nova.

cold-snap.desc: Reduce cooldown of Frost Nova to 9 seconds.

frozen-mist.desc: Frost Nova no longer freezes enemies, but instead leaves behind a mist of frost that deals 160% weapon damage as Cold over 8 seconds.

deep-freeze.desc: If Frost Nova hits at least 5 targets, you gain a 15% bonus to Critical Hit Chance for 12 seconds.

bone-chill.desc: Enemies take 15% more damage while frozen or chilled by Frost Nova.

arcane-orb.desc: Cost: 35 Arcane PowerHurl an orb of pure energy that explodes when it hits, dealing 175% weapon damage as Arcane to all enemies within 10 yards.

obliteration.desc: Increase the damage of the explosion to deal 228% weapon damage as Arcane.

arcane-orbit.desc: Create 4 Arcane Orbs that orbit you, exploding for 70% weapon damage as Arcane when enemies get close.

arcane-nova.desc: Modify the orb to deal 175% weapon damage as Arcane to all enemies within 20 yards.

tap-the-source.desc: Reduce casting cost to 20 Arcane Power.

celestial-orb.desc: The orb will pierce through targets, damaging any enemy it passes through.

diamond-skin.desc: Cooldown: 15 secondsTransform your skin to diamond for 6 seconds, absorbing up to 10853 damage from incoming attacks.

crystal-shell.desc: Increases the maximum amount of damage absorbed to 21707 damage.

prism.desc: Reduces Arcane Power cost of all spells by 7 while Diamond Skin is active.

mirror-skin.desc: Reflects 100% of damage absorbed back at the attacker.

enduring-skin.desc: Increases the duration of Diamond Skin to 9 seconds.

diamond-shards.desc: When Diamond Skin wears off, diamond shards explode in all directions dealing 210% weapon damage as Physical to nearby enemies.

wave-of-force.desc: Cost: 25 Arcane PowerCooldown: 12 secondsDischarge a wave of pure energy that repels projectiles and knocks back nearby enemies. This also slows the movement of enemies by 60% and deals 200% weapon damage as Physical.

impactful-wave.desc: Increases the distance enemies are knocked back and Stuns all affected enemies for 2 seconds.

force-affinity.desc: Reduce casting cost to 15 Arcane Power and the cooldown is reduced to 9 seconds.

forceful-wave.desc: Increases damage to 260% weapon damage as Physical, but reduces Knockback.

teleporting-wave.desc: Enemies caught in the wave are teleported to a random location.

exploding-wave.desc: Enemies hit have a 40% chance to cause a smaller Wave of Force that deals 100% weapon damage as Physical and knocks back enemies caught in its wake.

spectral-blade.desc: This is a Signature spell. Signature spells are free to cast.Summon a spectral blade that strikes all enemies in your path for 165% weapon damage.

deep-cuts.desc: Enemies hit by the blade will Bleed for an additional 45% weapon damage over 3 seconds.

impactful-blades.desc: Hits Slow the movement of enemies by 80% for 1 second.

siphoning-blade.desc: Every enemy hit grants 3 Arcane Power.

healing-blades.desc: Whenever the blades do damage, you are healed for 5% of the damage done.

thrown-blade.desc: Extends the reach of Spectral Blade to 20 yards.

arcane-torrent.desc: Cost: 16 Arcane PowerHurl a barrage of arcane projectiles that deal 210% weapon damage as Arcane to all enemies near the impact location.

disruption.desc: Targets hit by Arcane Torrent become disrupted for 6 seconds, causing them to take 15% additional damage from any attacks that deal Arcane damage.

death-blossom.desc: Unleash a torrent of power beyond your control. You no longer direct where the projectiles go, but their damage is increased to 670% weapon damage as Arcane.

arcane-mines.desc: Instead of firing projectiles, lay Arcane mines that arm after 2 seconds. These mines explode when an enemy approaches, dealing 180% weapon damage as Arcane. Enemies caught in the explosion have their movement and attack speeds reduced by 30% for 3 seconds.

power-stone.desc: Every missile hit has a 2% chance to leave behind a Power Stone that grants Arcane Power when picked up.

cascade.desc: Enemies killed by Arcane Torrent have a 100% chance to fire a new missile at a nearby enemy dealing 210% weapon damage as Arcane.

energy-twister.desc: Cost: 35 Arcane PowerUnleash a twister of pure energy that deals 360% weapon damage as Arcane over 6 seconds to everything in its path.

mistral-breeze.desc: Reduces casting cost of Energy Twister to 20 Arcane Power.

gale-force.desc: Increases the damage of Energy Twister to 468% weapon damage as Arcane.

raging-storm.desc: When two Energy Twisters collide, they merge into a tornado with increased area of effect that causes 360% weapon damage as Arcane over 6 seconds.

wicked-wind.desc: Twisters no longer travel but spin in place, dealing 252% weapon damage as Arcane over 6 seconds to everything caught in them.

storm-chaser.desc: Casting Energy Twister grants you a Wind Charge. You can store up to 3 Wind Charges at a time. Casting a Signature spell releases all Wind Charges as a giant Energy Twister that deals 75% weapon damage as Arcane per Wind Charge. The following skills are Signature spells: Magic Missile Shock Pulse Spectral Blade Electrocute

ice-armor.desc: Cost: 25 Arcane PowerSurround yourself in a barrier of ice that reduces damage from melee attacks by 12%. Melee attackers are either Chilled or Frozen for 2 seconds. Lasts 120 seconds.This is an Armor spell. Only one Armor spell can be active at a time.

chilling-aura.desc: Lower the temperature of the air around you. Nearby enemies are chilled, slowing their movement speed by 30%.

crystallize.desc: Whenever you are struck by a melee attack, your Armor is increased by 20% for 30 seconds. This effect can stack up to 3 times.

jagged-ice.desc: Melee attackers also take 130% weapon damage as Cold.

ice-reflect.desc: Melee attacks have a 25% chance to create a Frost Nova centered on the attacker, dealing 75% weapon damage as Cold.

frozen-storm.desc: A whirling storm of ice builds around you that deals 30% weapon damage as Cold over 3 seconds after casting Ice Armor.

electrocute.desc: This is a Signature spell. Signature spells are free to cast.Lightning arcs from your fingertips, dealing 90% weapon damage as Lightning. The lightning can jump, hitting up to 2 additional enemies.

chain-lightning.desc: Increases the maximum number of enemies that can be electrocuted to 6.

forked-lightning.desc: Critical Hits release 4 charged bolts in random directions, dealing 55% weapon damage as Lightning to any targets hit.

lightning-blast.desc: Create streaks of lightning that pierce through targets, hitting all enemies for 86% weapon damage as Lightning.

surge-of-power.desc: Gain 1 Arcane Power for every enemy hit by Electrocute.

arc-lightning.desc: Blast a cone of lightning that causes 115% weapon damage as Lightning to all affected targets.

slow-time.desc: Cooldown: 15 secondsInvoke a bubble of warped time and space for 8 seconds, reducing enemy attack speed by 20% and movement speed by 60%. This bubble also slows the movement of enemy projectiles by 90%.

miasma.desc: Slow Time effects cling to enemies for 3 seconds after they have left the bubble.

time-warp.desc: Enemies caught in the bubble of warped time take 20% more damage.

time-shell.desc: Increases the potency of the movement speed reduction to 80%.

perpetuity.desc: Reduces the cooldown of Slow Time to 12 seconds.

stretch-time.desc: Time is sped up for any allies standing in the area, increasing their attack speed by 10%.

storm-armor.desc: Cost: 25 Arcane PowerBathe yourself in electrical energy, periodically shocking a nearby enemy for 100% weapon damage as Lightning. Lasts 120 seconds.This is an Armor spell. Only one Armor spell can be active at a time.

reactive-armor.desc: Ranged and melee attackers are shocked for 70% weapon damage as Lightning.

power-of-the-storm.desc: Reduce the Arcane Power cost of all skills by 3 while Storm Armor is active.

thunder-storm.desc: Increase the damage of the shock to 130% weapon damage as Lightning.

scramble.desc: Increases your movement speed by 25% for 3 seconds whenever you are hit by melee or ranged attacks.

shocking-aspect.desc: Critical Hits have a chance to electrocute a nearby enemy for 35% weapon damage as Lightning.

explosive-blast.desc: Cost: 20 Arcane PowerCooldown: 6 secondsGather an infusion of energy around you that explodes after 1.5 seconds, causing 225% weapon damage as Physical to all enemies within 12 yards.

unleashed.desc: Reduces the casting cost of Explosive Blast to 10 Arcane Power.

time-bomb.desc: Explosive Blast detonates from the point it was originally cast after 2.5 seconds for 315% weapon damage as Physical.

short-fuse.desc: Immediately release the energy of Explosive Blast for 225% weapon damage as Physical.

obliterate.desc: Increases the explosion radius to 18 yards for 225% weapon damage as Physical.

chain-reaction.desc: A chain of 3 consecutive explosions cascade off you, each causing 97% weapon damage as Physical.

magic-weapon.desc: Cost: 25 Arcane PowerImbue your weapon with magical energy, granting it 10% increased damage. Lasts 5 minutes.

electrify.desc: Attacks have a chance to cause lightning to arc to 3 nearby enemies, dealing 10% weapon damage as Lightning.

force-weapon.desc: Increases the damage bonus of Magic Weapon to 15% damage, and gives up to a 2% chance to Knockback any enemies hit.

conduit.desc: Attacks have a chance to restore 1 Arcane Power.

venom.desc: Attacks poison enemies, dealing 15% weapon damage as Poison over 3 seconds.

blood-magic.desc: Attacks recover 1.5% of damage caused as Life.

hydra.desc: Cost: 15 Arcane PowerSummon a multi-headed Hydra for 15 seconds that attacks enemies with bolts of fire dealing 28% weapon damage as Fire. You may only have one Hydra active at a time.

arcane-hydra.desc: Summon an Arcane Hydra that spits Arcane Orbs, which explode on impact, causing 60% weapon damage as Arcane to enemies near the explosion.

lightning-hydra.desc: Summon a Lightning Hydra that electrocutes enemies for 64% weapon damage as Lightning.

venom-hydra.desc: Summon a poison breathing Hydra that leaves a pool of acid that causes 18% weapon damage per second as Poison to enemies who remain in the pool.

frost-hydra.desc: Summon a Frost Hydra that breathes a short range cone of frost, causing 36% weapon damage as Cold to all enemies in the cone.

mammoth-hydra.desc: Summon a Mammoth Hydra that breathes a river of flame at nearby enemies, dealing 67% weapon damage per second as Fire to enemies caught on the burning ground.

disintegrate.desc: Cost: 18 Arcane PowerThrust a beam of pure energy forward, dealing 170% weapon damage as Arcane and disintegrating enemies it kills.

convergence.desc: Increase the width of the beam allowing it to hit more enemies.

chaos-nexus.desc: When casting the beam you become charged with energy that spits out at nearby enemies doing 44% weapon damage as Arcane.

volatility.desc: Enemies killed by the beam have a 35% chance to explode causing 395% weapon damage as Arcane to all enemies within 8 yards.

entropy.desc: The beam fractures into a short-ranged cone that deals 196% weapon damage as Arcane.

intensify.desc: Damage increases slowly over time to inflict a maximum of 221% weapon damage as Arcane.

familiar.desc: Cost: 20 Arcane PowerSummon a companion that will attack your targets for 20% weapon damage as Arcane. This companion cannot be targeted or damaged by enemies and lasts for 5 minutes.

sparkflint.desc: Summon a fiery Familiar that increases the damage of all attacks by 12% while Familiar is active.

vigoron.desc: While the Familiar is active, you regenerate 310 Life per second.

ancient-guardian.desc: Summon a protective Familiar. When you are below 50% Life the Familiar will fully absorb damage from 1 attack every 6 seconds.

arcanot.desc: While the Familiar is active, you regenerate 2 Arcane Power per second.

cannoneer.desc: The Familiar's projectiles explode on impact, dealing 20% weapon damage as Arcane to all enemies within 6 yards.

teleport.desc: Cost: 15 Arcane PowerCooldown: 16 secondsTeleport through the ether to the selected location up to 35 yards away.

safe-passage.desc: For 4 seconds after you Teleport, you will take 30% less damage.

wormhole.desc: After casting Teleport, there is a 1 second delay before the cooldown begins, allowing you to Teleport again.

reversal.desc: Casting Teleport again within 8 seconds will instantly return you to your original location.

fracture.desc: Summon 2 decoys for 8 seconds after teleporting.

calamity.desc: Casts a low power Wave of Force upon arrival, dealing 265% weapon damage as Physical to all nearby enemies.

mirror-image.desc: Cooldown: 15 secondsSummon 2 illusionary duplicates of yourself that last for 7 seconds and have 25% of your Life. The images may cast some of the same spells as you, but those spells deal no damage.

simulacrum.desc: Increase the Life of your Mirror Images to 100% of your own.

duplicates.desc: Summon 5 Mirror Images that have 25% of your Life each.

mocking-demise.desc: When a Mirror Image is destroyed, it explodes, doing 45% weapon damage as Physical and has a 50% chance to Stun for 2 seconds.

extension-of-will.desc: The duration of your Mirror Images is increased to 10 seconds and their Life is increased to 29% of your Life.

mirror-mimics.desc: Spells cast by your Mirror Images will do 10% of the damage of your own spells.

meteor.desc: Cost: 50 Arcane PowerSummon an immense Meteor that plummets from the sky, causing 260% weapon damage as Fire to all enemies it crashes into. The ground it hits is scorched with molten fire that deals 60% weapon damage as Fire over 3 seconds.

molten-impact.desc: Increases the damage of the Meteor impact to 390% weapon damage as Fire and the molten fire to 90% weapon damage as Fire over 3 seconds.

star-pact.desc: Reduces the casting cost of Meteor to 35 Arcane Power and the damage type to Arcane.

meteor-shower.desc: Unleash a volley of 7 smaller Meteors that each strike for 104% weapon damage as Fire.

comet.desc: Transforms the Meteor to ice that deals 312% weapon damage as Cold. The impact site is covered in a freezing mist that deals 72% weapon damage as Cold and Slows enemy movement by 60% over 3 seconds.

liquefy.desc: If the initial impact of the Meteor causes a Critical Hit, the molten fire duration is increased to 8 seconds.

blizzard.desc: Cost: 40 Arcane PowerCall down shards of ice to pelt an area, dealing 210% weapon damage as Cold to all enemies in the area over 6 seconds. Multiple casts in the same area do not stack.

grasping-chill.desc: After the Blizzard ends, the ground is covered in a low lying mist for 3 seconds that Slows the movement speed of enemies by 60%.

frozen-solid.desc: Enemies caught in the Blizzard have a 20% chance to be Frozen for 3 seconds.

snowbound.desc: Reduces the casting cost of Blizzard to 20 Arcane Power.

stark-winter.desc: Increases the size of Blizzard to cover 22 yards, dealing 210% weapon damage as Cold over 6 seconds.

unrelenting-storm.desc: Increases the duration of Blizzard to deal 280% weapon damage as Cold over 8 seconds.

energy-armor.desc: Cost: 25 Arcane PowerFocus your energies, increasing your Armor by 35% but decreasing your maximum Arcane Power by 20. Lasts 120 seconds.This is an Armor spell. Only one Armor spell can be active at a time.

absorption.desc: You have a chance to gain 4 Arcane Power whenever you are hit by a ranged or melee attack.

pinpoint-barrier.desc: Increases your chance to critically hit by 5% while Energy Armor is active.

energy-tap.desc: Rather than decreasing your maximum Arcane Power, Energy Armor increases it by 20 while it is active.

force-armor.desc: While Energy Armor is active, incoming attacks that would deal more than 35% of your maximum Life are reduced to deal 35% of your maximum Life instead.

prismatic-armor.desc: Increases all of your resistances by 25% while Energy Armor is active.

archon.desc: Cost: 25 Arcane PowerCooldown: 120 secondsTransform into a being of pure Arcane energy for 15 seconds. While in Archon form, your normal abilities are replaced by powerful Archon abilities, and your Armor and resistances are increased by 40%. Every enemy killed while in Archon form adds 1 seconds to the duration of Archon.

arcane-destruction.desc: An explosion erupts around you when you transform, causing 1600% weapon damage as Arcane to all enemies within 15 yards.

teleport.desc: Archon form can now cast Teleport with a cooldown of 10 seconds.

pure-power.desc: Decreases the cooldown of Archon to 100 seconds.

slow-time.desc: Archon form can cast Slow Time that lasts for 15 seconds.

improved-archon.desc: Increases the damage of all Archon abilities by 25%.

power-hungry.desc: Gain 30 Arcane Power whenever you are healed by a health globe.

glass-cannon.desc: Increases all damage done by 15%, but decreases Armor and resistances by 10%.

prodigy.desc: When you deal damage with a Signature spell, you gain 4 Arcane Power.The following skills are Signature spells: Magic Missile Shock Pulse Spectral Blade Electrocute

astral-presence.desc: Increases your maximum Arcane Power by 20 and Arcane Power regeneration by 2 per second.

illusionist.desc: Whenever you suffer more than 15% of your Life in a single hit, the cooldowns on Mirror Image and Teleport are automatically reset.

cold-blooded.desc: All damage dealt to chilled and frozen targets is increased by 20%.

conflagration.desc: Fire damage dealt to enemies applies a burning effect, increasing all damage done to them by 10% for 3 seconds.

paralysis.desc: Lightning damage dealt to enemies has up to a 8% chance to Stun the target for 1.5 seconds.

galvanizing-ward.desc: Increases the duration of your Armor spells by 120 seconds. As long as an Armor spell is active, you gain 310 Life per second.The following skills are improved: Energy Armor Ice Armor Storm Armor

temporal-flux.desc: Whenever you deal Arcane damage, enemies are slowed by 30% for 2 seconds.

critical-mass.desc: Critical Hits have a chance to reduce the cooldown of your spells by 1 second.

arcane-dynamo.desc: When you deal damage with a Signature spell you may gain a Flash of Insight. After 5 Flashes of Insight, your next non-Signature spell deals 75% additional damage.The following skills are Signature spells: Magic Missile Shock Pulse Spectral Blade Electrocute

unstable-anomaly.desc: When reduced below 30% Life, you heal to 45% of your maximum Life and release a shockwave that knocks enemies back and slows them by 60% for 3 seconds. This effect cannot occur more than once every 60 seconds.
